item.title: UT2004? How About Q3A?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Thunderstrike)
item.dc:creator: Thunderstrike
item.content:encoded:
I know I'm just spamming up the forum, but what the hell! Recently I happened to be visiting the "lvl" review site over on PlanetQuake and, as always when I happen by there, I checked out some of the recent featured maps on their front page. The screenshot for this one caught my eye, and being authored by Sock, whose Q3A mapping and texturing talents were no stranger to me, I took the time to download it and check it out. I know we're all about UT and its derivatives around here, but I...

UT2004? How About Q3A?

item.title: Real Life Calls
item.author: invalid@example.com (SkaarjMaster)
item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded:
Well guys, I was hoping to get a good 6 more months of solid gaming in before this happened but the adoption agency called on Thursday (12-16-04) and told us they have a baby for us and the birth mother is due January 6th. If this goes through, then it looks like my wife and I are on the fast track to parenthood. I don't know how often I'll be able to play UT/UT2004 and hang out in the forums, but I do plan to stop by now and then and check for new maps and stuff. I'm getting Doom3 for...

Real Life Calls

item.title: this is better and more addictive!
item.author: invalid@example.com (SkaarjMaster)
item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded:
http://meph.eu.org

You can go farther in this version. My high score in the old one was 321.1 and no matter how hard I tried I couldn't get any better. My high score on this new version is 568.5!

I'll edit this when I get the chance, so go to the bottom of this thread to make sure of the highest score (or lowest for that matter) to beat. Here's the scores so far (first person to get a score in higher position):

Slide
593.5 >> Homeslice
593 >> barballs
593 >>...

this is better and more addictive!

item.title: I need a forum

item.content:encoded: I need a forum that is embedded into the website and i can't find any for basic HTML not PHP

item.title: Good Lightning, bad lightning!
item.author: invalid@example.com (SkaarjMaster)
item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded:
Good Lightning: The Tampa Bay Lightning won the Stanley Cup! Woohoo!!!

Bad lightning: We had a storm last night in Tampa and the electricity went off 4 times. Two of those times I was on the computer and my Klipsch speakers make a serious popping sound when it happens and it sounds like something went bad inside the case. Everytime this happens it freaks me out. And, I wasn't on the computer during the storm. The first time was before it started and the second time was after it passed...

Good Lightning, bad lightning!

item.title: So who's seen the flying Leviathan bug yet?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Johnny Bravo)
item.dc:creator: Johnny Bravo
item.content:encoded:
So who's seen the flying Leviathan bug in action?

I'm going to be sad once this gets patched out but last night on the server I play on we decided to have some fun. I should add that a few times a night we'll stop playing, load up an Onslaught map and do stunts for a half hour. Good fun.

Anywho if you haven't heard, there's a bug where if you put a Raptor next to a Leviathan and have the Leviathan deploy then you'll make a flying Leviathan. Here are a few screen shots from...

So who's seen the flying Leviathan bug yet?

item.title: Unreal Engine 3.0 video from nVidia NV40 demonstration

item.content:encoded:
Just in case some of yall don't visit the Beyond Unreal main web page... then there is a new video in town, straight from the (*cough*refer to title). you can download it from BU here and here's what I commented about it:

... *jaw hits floor*..............wow. this looks awesome. too cool. 10 times the detail as unreal tournament 2004 possible......10,000 polygon character models oposed to 1500 in ut2k4...and...

Unreal Engine 3.0 video from nVidia NV40 demonstration

item.title: Eden Eclipse: TC mod
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gui)
item.dc:creator: Gui
item.content:encoded:
Eden Eclipse is a Science-Fiction first person 3D action game set in the dark and distant future where industrial companies fight each other for the control of the remaining ressources. You take on the persona of a brave female soldier named Lt. Amber Daniels whose past is unknown also for herself.

Sent by the Vault Enterprises company to the rescue of the mobil mining complex MRU2 with her squad, she'll have to guide her team through the perils of a harsh...

Eden Eclipse: TC mod

item.title: Other Games Thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (SkaarjMaster)
item.dc:creator: SkaarjMaster
item.content:encoded:
Believe it or not, I do play other games besides the Unreal series, hehe. Ever since I first got UT on 6-4-2000 (Yes, I do remember the date; that's pretty sick isn't it ), I've almost exclusively played UT or UT2003. Recently, I've started up some of the older games that I never finished or never even started. In the past, I've completed such games as:
Doom
Doom2
Final Doom
Rise Of the Triad
Blake Stone series
Duke Nukem 3D
Nitemare 3D
7th Guest
Hell
Unreal
Unreal...

Other Games Thread

item.title: InstaGib CTF
item.author: invalid@example.com (rickclark58)
item.dc:creator: rickclark58
item.content:encoded:
This is probably not new to you guys, but I thought I would try CTF with the Zoom InstaGib mutator and I have to say that I like it as much, maybe more, than standard CTF. It seems to make it a much more tactical game and less brute force. It also adds a lot more tension to flag running; I can almost feel the crosshairs on the back of my neck while I am running.

My favorite map in this mode right now is CTF-ForestOfGiants. It plays extremely well in this mode, and I noticed that the bots...

InstaGib CTF

item.title: Unreal II XMP
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gui)
item.dc:creator: Gui
item.content:encoded:
Did any of you try it? I did yesterday with the full version and it's very cool IMO: lot of team action and some nice suspense, vehicles work well and all classes look well balanced to me

Strongly recommended
